verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> on David's behalf, All <S%H3605><s%> his affliction; <S%H6031><s%>
How <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And vowed <S%H5087><s%> to the Mighty <S%H46><s%> One <S%H46><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%>
"Surely <S%H518><s%> I will not enter <S%H935><s%> my house, <S%H1004><s%> Nor <S%H518><s%> lie <S%H5927><s%> on my bed <S%H6210><s%>; <S%H3326><s%>
I will not give <S%H5414><s%> sleep <S%H8142><s%> to my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> Or slumber <S%H8572><s%> to my eyelids; <S%H6079><s%>

Until <S%H5704><s%> I find <S%H4672><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> A dwelling <S%H4908><s%> place <S%H4908><s%> for the Mighty <S%H46><s%> One <S%H46><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> "
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we heard <S%H8085><s%> of it in Ephrathah; <S%H672><s%> We found <S%H4672><s%> it in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Jaar. <S%H9194><s%>
Let us go <S%H935><s%> into His dwelling <S%H4908><s%> place; <S%H4908><s%> Let us worship <S%H7812><s%> at His footstool. <S%H1916><s%> <S%H7272><s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to Thy resting <S%H4496><s%> place; <S%H4496><s%> Thou and the ark <S%H727><s%> of Thy strength. <S%H5797><s%>
Let Thy priests <S%H3548><s%> be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with righteousness; <S%H6664><s%> And let Thy godly <S%H2623><s%> ones <S%H2623><s%> sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy. <S%H7442><s%>
For the sake <S%H5668><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> Thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> Do not turn <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of Thine anointed. <S%H4899><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> A truth <S%H571><s%> from which He will not turn <S%H7725><s%> back; <S%H7725><s%> "Of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%> I will set <S%H7896><s%> upon your throne. <S%H3678><s%>

"If <S%H518><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> My covenant, <S%H1285><s%> And My testimony <S%H9381><s%> which <S%H2097><s%> I will teach <S%H3925><s%> them, Their sons <S%H1121><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> shall sit <S%H3427><s%> upon your throne <S%H3678><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>"
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> Zion; <S%H6726><s%> He has desired <S%H183><s%> it for His habitation. <S%H4186><s%>
"This <S%H384><s%> is My resting <S%H4496><s%> place <S%H4496><s%> forever; <S%H5703><s%> Here <S%H6311><s%> I will dwell, <S%H3427><s%> for I have desired <S%H183><s%> it.
"I will abundantly <S%H1288><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> her provision; <S%H9479><s%> I will satisfy <S%H7646><s%> her needy <S%H34><s%> with bread. <S%H3899><s%>

"Her priests <S%H3548><s%> also I will clothe <S%H3847><s%> with salvation; <S%H3468><s%> And her godly <S%H2623><s%> ones <S%H2623><s%> will sing <S%H7442><s%> aloud <S%H7442><s%> for joy. <S%H7442><s%>

"There <S%H8033><s%> I will cause the horn <S%H7161><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> to spring <S%H6779><s%> forth; <S%H6779><s%> I have prepared <S%H6186><s%> a lamp <S%H5216><s%> for Mine anointed. <S%H4899><s%>
"His enemies <S%H340><s%> I will clothe <S%H3847><s%> with shame; <S%H1322><s%> But upon himself his crown <S%H5145><s%> shall shine. <S%H6692><s%>"
